mapper.insert: insert into myapp_member(name, id, age, height, weight, gender, password) values(#{name},#{id},#{age},#{height},#{weight},#{gender},sha1(#{password}))
mapper.select: select member_no, name, id, age, height, weight, gender from myapp_member order by name desc
select member_no, name, id, age, height, weight, gender, created_date from myapp_member where member_no=#{no}
select member_no, name, id, age, height, weight, gender, created_date from myapp_member where id=#{id} and password=sha1(#{password})
mapper.update: update myapp_member set name=#{name}, id=#{id}, age=#{age}, height=#{height}, weight=#{weight}, gender=#{gender}, password=sha1(#{password}) where member_no=#{no}
